summary: Retired Soviet Lt. Col. Stanislav Petrov, who saved the world from WW3, talks about his life as retiree and shares his opinions on the Cold War with actor Kevin Costner in this melancholic mixture of documentary and reenacted footage.
cast: Stanislav Petrov|Kevin Costner|Sergey Shnyryov|Nataliya Vdovina|Walter Cronkite|Oleg Kassin|Galina Kalinina|Robert De Niro|Matt Damon|Ashton Kutcher|Vilis Daudzins|Igor Chernyavskiy|Girts Jakovlevs|Mihails Karasikovs|Igor Filippov|Douglas Mattern|Sanders Kevin|Ieva Aleksandrova-Eklone|Baiba Broka|Girts Kesteris|Levs Retniks|Rodions Kuzmins|Alexa Khaimenova
title: The Man Who Saved the World
